title: Beaver (1920) Mark
description: The Gospel of Mark translated into Beaver in 1920 by Reverend A. C. Garrioch for the British and Foreign Bible Society. Beaver is an Athabascan language of western Canada.

language.name: Beaver
language.area: Northeast British Columbia and northwest Alberta, Chateh (Assumption) on Hay River, and Prophet River south of Fort Nelson.
